CustomObject.description:
Allows the optional configuration of settings specific to this implementation of Salesforce. Documentation should be produced for the settings that can be created to customise the behaviour of the application.
Note: This custom setting requires that 'Manage List Custom Settings Type' is enabled under Setup->Data->Schema Settings.
Documentation on usage can be found here: https://makepositive.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DEV/pages/1193115688/Application+Properties
CustomObject.label: Application Properties
